series.title: Breaking Bad
series.cast: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn
series.overview: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to create and sell the purest methamphetamine.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.cast: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder
series.overview: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces to get him back.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.cast: Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington, Peter Dinklage
series.overview: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

series.title: The Office
series.cast: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
series.overview: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

series.title: Friends
series.cast: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow
series.overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

series.title: The Crown
series.cast: Olivia Colman, Tobias Menzies, Helena Bonham Carter
series.overview: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the twentieth century.

series.title: Sherlock
series.cast: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs
series.overview: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.cast: Pedro Pascal, Gina Carano, Giancarlo Esposito
series.overview: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

series.title: The Simpsons
series.cast: Dan Castellaneta, Nancy Cartwright, Harry Shearer
series.overview: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

series.title: Westworld
series.cast: Evan Rachel Wood, Jeffrey Wright, Ed Harris
series.overview: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin.

series.title: Black Mirror
series.cast: Daniel Lapaine, Hannah John-Kamen, Michaela Coel
series.overview: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

series.title: The Witcher
series.cast: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra
series.overview: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

series.title: House of Cards
series.cast: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly
series.overview: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

series.title: Money Heist
series.cast: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño
series.overview: A group of unique robbers assault the Factory of Moneda and Timbre to carry out the most perfect robbery in the history of Spain and take home 2.4 billion euros.

series.title: The X-Files
series.cast: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Mitch Pileggi
series.overview: Two FBI agents, Fox Mulder and Dana Scully, work in an unassigned detail of the bureau called the X-Files investigating cases dealing with unexplained paranormal phenomena.

series.title: Dexter
series.cast: Michael C. Hall, Jennifer Carpenter, David Zayas
series.overview: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

series.title: The Walking Dead
series.cast: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride
series.overview: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

series.title: Mindhunter
series.cast: Jonathan Groff, Holt McCallany, Anna Torv
series.overview: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

series.title: Narcos
series.cast: Wagner Moura, Boyd Holbrook, Pedro Pascal
series.overview: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.

series.title: The Handmaid's Tale
series.cast: Elisabeth Moss, Yvonne Strahovski, Joseph Fiennes
series.overview: Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

series.title: Peaky Blinders
series.cast: Cillian Murphy, Paul Anderson, Helen McCrory
series.overview: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England, and centered on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
